radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
radiographic_examinations.findings: Lung bases clear without focal opacity, pleural or pericardial effusion. Normal appearance of liver transplant, portal and hepatic veins patent. Gallbladder absent, no biliary stricturing. Pancreas largely fatty replaced with mild peripancreatic fat stranding. Native kidneys atrophic with mild contrast excretion. Unremarkable adrenal glands and spleen. Normal small and large bowel, appendix normal. No free air or fluid in abdomen, no pathological lymphadenopathy. No lytic or sclerotic bony lesion.
